name: Statista Research Agent
description: A powerful research agent with access to Statista's comprehensive statistical database. Search for statistics across various topics and retrieve detailed chart data including sources, methodology, and formatted data points.

skills.name: Search Statistics
skills.description: Search Statista's database for statistics matching a query. Returns relevant statistics with IDs, titles, subjects, and preview information.

skills.name: Get Chart Data
skills.description: Retrieve detailed chart data for a specific statistic by ID. Returns complete chart information including graph type, data points, sources, and metadata.

bearerAuth.description: Bearer token authentication for accessing the Statista agent
